0: good location very comfortable and perfect for business or pleasure
I was on a long drive down the coast and I needed a safe and clean place to stay for 1 night so I was pleasantly surprised with this hotel
Early check in and stuff was friendly and helpful
The fourth floor king bed room looked newly remodeled and was decent although it looked like the remodel ran out of of money
Clean quiet and easy access from freeway staffs ability to resolve problems at night
The front desk girls were nice apologizing and brought up keys to the new room quickly
Came in late from traveling everyone was friendly and the room was great
The cleanliness and size of the room as well as the quality of the mattress
From the cheerful friendly check in clerk to the very comfortable and well appointed room
1: Having eaten there last time we chose to eat elsewhere
I called again this Monday same thing
So I stayed one night and paid for two
Booked rooms six months in advance for a family reunion
I was glad they checked my ID before giving me another key
Anyway about 7 cars in the parking lot
The room we stayed in was okay
Would not use this hotel again
I got my room key and was assigned a room of the first floor
Size of the room and bathroom
2: The interior is more like a four star hotel
The biggest problem was that my card was charged for multiple restaurant charges AFTER I had checked out and left in the shuttle
Service As far as I could see there were only 4 employees working yesterday two at the front desk the cook and shuttle driver
Upon check in I was told that there was one available but it was accessible
TV goes off every four hours
I have to mentioned that it FREE parking
Other then that i d give the place a 48 out of 5
